lenders.name: Agnes Chu
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to pursue happiness.

lenders.name: Cabrillo College
lenders.loan_because: WE believe in the possibility for change. Poverty can be over come and KIVA is a great way to join the efforts and join the community that is reaching out to people all over the world. WE are excited to be here, let's get started and work together. We are looking forward to seeing the power of community through KIVA! In the words of Ben Harper we have to believe that,"[we] can change the world, make it a better place, make it a kinder place, make peace on earth, with [our] own two hands..."
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of college students who have been inspired by the positive change that KIVA is committed to. Poverty can be overcome and it begins with people standing up and taking action against it. So we are here to join in the efforts and are very excited and thankful for the opportunity to be a part of something big, positive, caring and effective at creating sustainable change. Let's do it!

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because:
I believe with Andre Brink (A Dry White Season) "There are only two kinds of madness one must guard against: One is the belief that we can do everything. The other is the belief that we can do nothing."

Or, as a proverb quoted by Dambisa Moyo in her book, "Dead Aid" puts it: "The best time to plant a tree is 20 years ago.  The second best time is now."
lenders.occupational_info: I teach biology and related subjects to high school students.  I also travel to Zambia, every other year, with students from my school.  We work with partner schools in Lusaka, mostly on computer skills training.

lenders.name: Eric

These types of jobs are hard to come by in my country.

lenders.name: suresh Gandhari
lenders.loan_because: i want to do  business of  musical instrument .which my ans ester had  done . i want  to preserve my cultural  musical instrument.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Gandharba are Nepal’s only traditional musician caste. According to myth, the original Gandharba descended from the heavens to spread local news, music and songs from community to community. In Hindu mythology the Gandharba were once the winged musicians of the Gods. Unfortunately, the Gandharbas belong to a caste that belongs to the "dalit" or “untouchables”- a title given to those born into a role that once left them within the socially and economically downtrodden groups of Nepal. Long before Television and the Radio, they travelled from place to place, playing their lively music and spreading news, making them messengers of the nation. Our ancestors would sing tales with themes ranging from battles and stories of long ago to local gossip, in exchange for a small amount of money or food. We played a significant role in spreading and preserving Nepali culture and folklore. During the unification of Nepal, King Prithivi Narayan Shah utilized the Gandharba people throughout the country to sing in favor of a united kingdom. Gandharbas further played a diplomatic and tactical role in the formation of Nepal as a united kingdom, by facilitating the transfer of information from one region to another, encouraging cooperation between the different districts that were finally uniting. Throughout Nepali History this has been the case, up until the present day, such as seen in the role played by the Gandharbas in the JANA ANDOLAN of 2006/2007.

The recent advances in modern media communication have displaced our traditional roles. Regular employment as a traditional Nepali folk musician is difficult to both find and secure, despite the fact that our music is a cultural treasure. We have little or no land and, due to poverty, many of us have not received an education beyond primary school. In an effort to find musical employment many Gandharbas have migrated to the main tourist areas of Nepal, hoping to sell an occasional Sarangi as a means of inconsistent income. We have our own culture, rituals, traditions and lifestyle, which we strive with the meager funds raised from sale of our musical instruments, or the occasional performances, to maintain in a modern, developing, ever more expensive world.

Relying so heavily on tourism as a source of income, most of the Gandharba living and working in the cities are left homeless and food-less during off-peak tourist seasons. Improved shelter, food, clothing, jobs, health and education are urgently required for this group of people to survive, as well as maintain their identity in this busy world. Still we wander form place to place, trying to make a living. Many of us have migrated from the village to the city with families in toe, looking for employment, better living conditions, and a better quality education for their children. The majority of Gandharbas are illiterate. Job discrimination is common - not a single senior level position in the government is held by a Gadharba. We have been involved in Dalit networks and in several programs involving but we are left out by the Dalit organizatons as well. so i want to so this business.  to get oppertunity and survive in  this expensive  Nepal.

I was able to get a sturdier bike, and therefore the paper route, and payed him off within a few months. In a few years, I was able to save enough money for my first car, which I eventually sold to pay for college, etc. A little help goes a long way.

lenders.name: epSos.de

Investing resources into progressive people does create a better future for us all.

Plus, the initial investment is returned quickly, so that the loans are very fair to the lender. This way the system of help works better than regular charity without returns, because lenders have an opportunity to reinvest their initial capital many times to multiple creative people in need.

This way the effect of micro loans is much greater than basic charity.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. The Lord has blessed us with so much and it is the least I can do in loaning some of that to others in need.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help people who are industrious and want to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to experience life's opportunities.

lenders.name: Dover Baptist Church
lenders.occupational_info: Church

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: The most promising way to stabilize the world is for everyone to be a part of it.  New entrepreneurs lead the way in pulling countries out of poverty and into the 21st century.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel and write about it, mostly for fun.

lenders.name: Morgynne
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me.  This is a pay it forward in His name.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the development process of computer software relating to telecommunications

lenders.name: Kyonin
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Healing organizations

lenders.name: Gilles
lenders.loan_because: j'aide parce que je peux

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to raise awareness of the wrongs in the world through helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I don't technically have a job.  I plan to have several fundraisers to generate money for my lending purposes.

lenders.name: Kirkgard
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: wonderful

lenders.name: Aileen
lenders.loan_because: I feel 10 times blessed that this network enables me to make a small investment go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage investment risk for a large pension. Kiva provides the highest return to the global economy at extremely low levels of risk IMHO.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: small actions can produce big results.

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because:
I'm a firm believer in helping others to help themselves.
Also I don't want to finance the administration of the big charity organizations but rather see my money doing something useful.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at SAP as Solution Architect for SAP HANA.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: the money is used to help someone begin or improve their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an inner city neighborhood in Chicago. We have a drop in center and are beginning to try and hook up with our neighbors.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: who else will reach out their hands to pick up these ones that have fallen often through circumstances beyond their control.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Telecommunication company managing a Team of people who answer incoming calls.

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have cognitive disabilities.  I go into their home and help them or their family with whatever they need.  Giving the person a shower, helping them use the bathroom, feeding them, etc.

lenders.name: Brian & Kevin
lenders.loan_because: we enjoy helping others reach their potential and achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: JoAnn
lenders.loan_because: I like that people on Kiva are working to make their situation better and want to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer emergency phone calls (911) and send police, fire, or ambulance to help people.

lenders.name: Julz & Bron
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-funding

lenders.name: Danita & Darryl Goode
lenders.loan_because: As Christians, we are to be lenders and not borrowers; it is our desire to help single moms throughout the nations improve the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Kama
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a little help  sometimes

lenders.name: The Caccavale Family
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy helping others who are less fortunate and require some assistance to perhaps make their lives a little more manageable.
lenders.occupational_info: We own Edible Arrangements of   Morristown, NJ, a franchise that offers sculpted and designed fruit arrangements that resemble floral bouquets.  Cris works at Wyeth Pharmaceuticals in Public Affairs. Lucas will be entering first grade in the Fall of 2009.

lenders.name: Dodie
lenders.occupation: flight attendant, mother, wife, friend, volunteer
lenders.loan_because: I can and it is a God thing..smiley face :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a flight attendant..I am a greeter, server, safety person on commercial airplanes..
